p: The cytogenetic studies involve assessment of CA(s) at metaphase stage, which gives a more accurate picture of the antimutagenic and anticlastogenic activity of the plant extracts or isolated compounds ( Siddique and Afzal, 2005). It has been reported that human lymphocytes are exceptionally sensitive indicators of the in vitro assay systems. In the present study, lymphocyte culture was used to evaluate the antimutagenic and antigenotoxic effects of EAP and the parameters analyzed were CAs and sister chromatid exchanges.
